thread.title: The Stranger Things Season 2 Trailer Got Us Thinking About Awkward ’80s Workout Trends
thread.title_full: The Stranger Things Season 2 Trailer Got Us Thinking About Awkward ’80s Workout Trends

author: jnosek1
title: The Stranger Things Season 2 Trailer Got Us Thinking About Awkward ’80s Workout Trends
text:
Privacy Policy | About Us 
Stranger Things season 2 arrives on Halloween, which is a very shrewd move on Netflix’s part, but also a very long time to make us wait. So in the meantime, let’s celebrate some other awesome touchstones from the ’80s—namely, these five regrettable workout trends that we swore would make us fit: Sweatin’ To the Oldies 
In 2017, Richard Simmons would be sweatin’ to Migos. A guy can dream. 8-Minute Abs 
Try Tabata instead and shave off 4 minutes. Jazzercise 
Your brain will break a sweat just thinking about how this ever was a thing. Suzanne Somers’ Thighmaster 
Wait, are we due for the Suzanne Somerssaince? Jane Fonda’s Workout Video 
Actually, we still have a copy of this in the Men’s Health gym. It holds up.
